thread.title: Clouds, rain over parts of Luzon — Pagasa
thread.title_full: Clouds, rain over parts of Luzon — Pagasa

author: cbibe
title: Clouds, rain over parts of Luzon — Pagasa

organizations.name: philippine atmospheric, geophysical and astronomical services administration

text:
Clouds, rain over parts of Luzon — Pagasa 08:55   Light clouds can be seen over Luzon in this satellite photo released by Pagasa. PAGASA WEBSITE 
Metro Manila, and the provinces of Isabela, Aurora, Rizal and Quezon will have cloudy skies with light to moderate rain and isolated thunderstorms on Wednesday , the weather bureau said. 
The northeast monsoon is affecting Northern Luzon, the Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration (Pagasa) said. 
Cloudy skies with light rain will prevail over the regions of Ilocos, Cordillera, rest of Cagayan Valley and the rest of Central Luzon, Pagasa said. ADVERTISEMENT 
The rest of the country will have partly cloudy to cloudy skies with isolated rainshowers or thunderstorms, it added. CBB
